kpi.name: M8013C28

kpi_info.title: Pre-empted UE contexts due to pre-emption of last non-GBR bearer
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of UE contexts being released due to lack of radio resources. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) with RNL cause "Radio resources not available".

kpi.kpi_alias: Pre-empted UE contexts due to pre-emption of last non-GBR bearer
